body_html: I happened to avoid the problem because I was lucky enough to read the 1.3.0 changelog where they mention that binaries are now build against cuDNN 6.0. Time to update the install guides (there's already people on StackOverflow scratching their heads)
body_text: I happened to avoid the problem because I was lucky enough to read the 1.3.0 changelog where they mention that binaries are now build against cuDNN 6.0. Time to update the install guides (there's already people on StackOverflow scratching their heads)
body: I happened to avoid the problem because I was lucky enough to read [the 1.3.0 changelog](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/RELEASE.md#release-130) where they mention that binaries are now build against cuDNN 6.0. Time to update the install guides (there's already people on StackOverflow scratching their heads)
